      public void conductLottery(String eventId, int numToSelect, Waitlist.LotteryCallback callback)
      Parameters:
      eventId - The unique identifier of the event.
      numToSelect - The number of attendees to be randomly selected from the waiting list.

    • organizerCancel

      public void organizerCancel(String eventID, String userID)
      Allows the organizer to cancel a user's invitation after the lottery has been conducted.
      Parameters:
      eventID - event's unique id
      userID - user's unique id

      Parameters:

      userID - user's unique id
      newStatus - the status to change the user to
